description:
Tanmoku Ki returns to his family home for the first time since making a pact with his new spirit shadow, You Keika. However, aside from Tanmoku`s grandmother, who welcomes Keika with happy tears, the welcoming mood in the sprawling mansion is noticeably stiff. Keika learns that there is a complicated relationship amoung the members of the Tanmoku family and even their retainers. Meanwhile, a mysterious man and woman appear and corner Keika. What on earth could their goal be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Part 2: Attention à votre partenaire au lit !
